message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $135?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $135 is still a bit steep. Would you be willing to go a bit lower?
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a decent profit. How about we meet at $130?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $130 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go a bit lower?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we might not meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $127.50?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, but $127.50 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at my target price?
